name: 1 Min Comic Maker
description:
Introduction:

Can you make a comic in one minute?
This game is made for the Tri Game Jam #155!
That means this game is made in 3 hours. 

Controls:

Use the mouse to drag an object around.
Use the scroll wheel to change the size of the object.
To Remove an item, simply drag the item over the trash icon.
To summon an item, open the one tab at the bottom of the screen. And click on the prevent item.

Note:

I couldn't finish the writeable text in the speech bubbles in 3 hours, unfortunately.

And my screen size is messed up so please play in full screen!

Disclaimer:

My computer glitched 1 hour into making the game, resetting my progress. So if you count that hour it's 4.
